text: Une superbe soirée aux # BBMAs où Céline rendait hommage au 20e anniversaire du film Titanic et de la chanson # MyHeartWillGoOn. A wonderful night at the # BBMAs where Céline got to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the movie Titanic and the song # MyHeartWillGoOn. Dress : @ stephanerolland _ paris Shoes : @ giuseppezanottidesign Key stylist : @ luxurylaw Make up : @ justinstclairmakeup Hair : Deanna ` ` Dee'' Marti A post shared by Céline Dion ( @ celinedion ) on May 21, 2017 at 8 : 21pm PD
